sentence: Last month, Tillis endorsed Cawthorn's primary challenger, state Sen. Chuck Edwards.
title: Rep. Madison Cawthorn cited for having a gun at Charlotte airport

sentence: Meanwhile, Senator Thom Tillis (R., N.C.) has endorsed Cawthorn's primary opponent, State Senator Chuck Edwards, in an election scheduled to be held on May 17.
author: Arjun Singh
title: Madison Cawthorn Stopped by Police from Taking Gun on Flight

sentence: State Senator Chuck Edwards leads the field of seven candidates looking to unseat Cawthorn.
author: Moira Warburton and David Shepardson
title: U.S. Rep. Cawthorn Cited For Gun At Airport -local Media

sentence: In the 2 1/2-minute video, the first-term lawmaker said that statistically, it's virtually impossible to beat an incumbent member of Congress after they won their first reelection.? He added that it was why you're starting to see this coordinated attack? against a lot of the first-term members of Congress who are hardcore conservatives going up for re-election across the country.? Cawthorn also harshly criticized an ad released by state Sen. Chuck Edwards (R), one of a number of his primary challengers, in which he knocked the congressman for his use of Instagram.
author: Sarakshi Rai
title: Cawthorn says establishment' is hitting him with coordinated drip campaign'
